Container.Name: Jenkins
Container.Overview:
This container will download and install the preferred version of Jenkins and install it.
Update Notice: If set to 'latest' the container will check on every startup if there is a newer version available).
All you data is stored in the jenkins/workdir folder in your appdata directory.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please
Container.Description:
This container will download and install the preferred version of Jenkins and install it.
Update Notice: If set to 'latest' the container will check on every startup if there is a newer version available).
All you data is stored in the jenkins/workdir folder in your appdata directory.

Config.Name: Jenkins Version
Config.Description: Enter the version wich you want to download or set to 'latest' (without quotes) to download the latest version and check on every restart if there is a newer version.

Config.Name: Jenkins Download URL
Config.Description: Mirror from wich to download jenkins you can get them from here: http://mirrors.jenkins-ci.org/status.html (Exemple for mirrors are: ftp://mirror.serverion.com | http://mirror.xmission.com | http://mirror.serverion.com | http://ftp-chi.osuosl.org/pub | ...).

Config.Name: Extra Jenkins Startup Paramaters
Config.Description: Enter extra Jenkins startup parameters if needed.

Config.Name: Extra JVM Startup Parameters
Config.Description: Enter extra JVM start parameters if needed.

Config.Name: Runtime Name
Config.Description: The name of the runtime (only change if you know what you are doing).
